testcase.classname: As a user, I want to add a new address record to my profile via API connection.
testcase.name: When an invalid POST body containing necessary data (name, email, address, phone, city, state, country,
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/profile/address-store" path parameters.............passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing the "Aleyna", "aleyna@gmail.com", "Sultanbeyli Istanbul", "5478526698", "Sultanbeyli", "Istanbul", "Turkey", "38000" and "11" information to send to the api profile address store endpoint..passed * The api user sends a POST request and records the response from the api profile address store endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 401.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "Unauthenticated.".passed
